name: UpdateErrorTrackingReleases
description:
Update error tracking releases in a project environment.

Use this tool to update error tracking releases for a specific project environment in Datadog. Ideal for modifying release information in error tracking systems.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the error tracking release to update.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The Project ID for accessing the specific project in Datadog. Obtainable by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: update_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the release you want to update.

parameters.name: release_hash_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the release you want to update. Provides a reference to the specific release version within the project's error tracking data.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier for the team. Used to specify which team's release information to update.

parameters.name: created_at_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp indicating when the release was created. Format should be ISO 8601 (e.g., '2023-09-23T18:25:43.511Z').

parameters.name: release_version
parameters.description: The version of the release being updated. This should typically be a string representing the version code or number.

parameters.name: project_key
parameters.description: The identifier or name of the project for which you're updating the error tracking release.

parameters.name: metadata_description
parameters.description: Provide a string with additional information or details about the release metadata.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking release.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking release.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
